item.title: GitHub - lechmazur/pact: A benchmark for conversational bargaining by language models. In each 20‑round match one LLM plays buyer, one plays seller, and both hold a hidden private value. Every round they swap a short public message, then post a bid or ask; a deal clears whenever the bid meets the ask.
